title: Fix Upload Transcript so loads nice in view transcript
description: When we use the upload transcript tool and upload a well formed Zoom transcript.txt we loose the names of the people speaking and the final uploaded transcript looks bad. I think we need to check the json upload and get that done correctly then work on the html presentation of the json.
